text: Request radio check

Inform that you are go for takeoff to the ATC and take permission

Request change of flight level
Request climb to desired FL
You have weather to your left and right take action
You have noticed one altimeter not working properly take action inform ATC
You are at BUKLO then, Est TOKIM , Est XOPOX give position report with active activity time , you can use hypothetical
At LKN wx normal 1205 Fl360 Est BBN 123 then GGC give position report with active hypothetical time

Request for descent clearance
Suddenly you have noticed port engine is on fire take action
One PAX medicall ill take action
You noticed engine vibration take action
Entered CB loosing altitude rapidly take action
Fuel onboard critically low take action
FO incapacitated take action
One person onboard behaving violently, threatning of having a weapon, possible hijack , take action.
Request immediate descent
